EmailTemplate.description: For the purpose of EEC. Notification to the participant, informing that they need to confirm presence.
EmailTemplate.name: EEC - Participant Confirm Presence
EmailTemplate.subject: Attendance Confirmation on {!Event_Registration__c.Event__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Event_Registration__c.Name},
Please confirm or decline the attendance for the {!Event_Registration__c.Event__c}, by changing the status to 'Confirmed' or 'Rejected'.
Please click on this link {!Event_Registration__c.Link} to confirm or decline your attendance.
